## Field trip Caples vs Caldor fire assessing impact levels

Durrell, Jack, Pat, and Rebecca toured the Caples Creek watershed to look at the different disturbance levels experienced with the Caples intentional fire vs the Caldor wildfire.

![Sun hits the tops of trees burned in the high-severity Caldor wildfire near Martin Meadow in the Caples Creek Restoration Project study area in June of 2023.](images/IMG_6232.jpeg){width="800"}
